dashboard.help: It is very easy to create interative and engaging lessons. The lessons and worksheet can be used for different purposes: classroom teaching, assignments, student self-learning and revision at home.
dashboard.title: Content Corner

children.help: View lessons which are approved - search easily based on name, subject, grade, author, description and keywords. Use them to teach.
children.title: View approved

children.help: Create new modules. You can embed interactive pages like mutiple choice and match the following even in your lessons. This way you can make your class room interactive. The same module can be sent out as assignment for students to revise and self-learn.
children.title: Create new

children.help: View, export and import page categories. Every page in a module can be categorized with these pre-configured categories. These are helpful to structure information and also search for modules containing pages of given categories.
